text: Kay Ullrich (5 May 1943 â€“ 4 January 2021) was a Scottish politician. She was a Scottish National Party Member of the Scottish Parliament for the West of Scotland region from 1999 to 2003. Ullrich was born in Prestwick, Scotland. Ullrich died on 4 January 2021, aged 77. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Scottish National Party members of the Scottish Parliament
title: Kay Ullrich
